column1: # settings needed for the circle finding algorithm
# This is how much the image will be downsampled when generating
# (but not checking the validity of) the circles. Higher means
# faster but less accurate circles. 5 is good.
# This is the min radius of the circle generated
# This is the fraction of points on a circle need to be supported
# in the image for it to be a "good" circle
# Number of valid circles to generate before algorithm stops.
# Note the algorithm still averages similar circles together
# it may return less circles than this
